active_flag.description: If Note is active or deleted

add_time.description: The creation date and time of the Note

content.description: Content of the Note in HTML format. Subject to sanitization on the back-end.

deal.description: The Deal this Note is attached to

title.description: The title of the Deal this Note is attached to

lead_id.description: The ID of the Lead the Note is attached to

deal_id.description: The ID of the Deal the Note is attached to

last_update_user_id.description: The ID of the User who updated the Note last

org_id.description: The ID of the Organization this Note is attached to

organization.description: The Organization this Note is attached to

name.description: The name of the Organization this Note is attached to

person.description: The Person this Note is attached to

name.description: The name of the Person this Note is attached to

person_id.description: The ID of the Person this Note is attached to

pinned_to_deal_flag.description: If true, then the results are filtered by Note to Deal pinning state.

pinned_to_organization_flag.description: If true, then the results are filtered by Note to Organization pinning state.

pinned_to_person_flag.description: If true, then the results are filtered by Note to Person pinning state.

update_time.description: The last updated date and time of the Note

user.description: The User who created the Note

email.description: The Email of the Note creator

icon_url.description: The URL of the Note creator avatar picture

is_you.description: If the Note is created by you or not

name.description: The name of the Note creator

user_id.description: The ID of the Note creator
